name: Konsepto Spoken Word Album - Collector's Badge
description:
Konsepto | Konteksto Spoken Word Album is the first ever NFT spoken word album in the Philippines. 

Here is the Konsepto | Konteksto Spoken Word Album COLLECTOR'S PERKS!

1. Holders who collected all 17 spoken word pieces will have a lifetime pass in Titik Poetry’s physical and online shows. They will also receive 2 special NFT gifts together with a collector's badge. Collectors will also receive special discount rates in Titik Productions services such Photo-Video coverage, spoken word performances, workshops, and t-shirts! Collectors will get a 50% discount in the upcoming music videos of each spoken word piece.
2. Holders who collected and completed either Konsepto or Konteksto will receive an NFT gift together with a collector's badge. Collectors will get a 25% discount in the upcoming music videos of each spoken word piece.
3. Holders who collected more than one spoken word piece will receive a 10% discount in Titik Poetry’s clothing line.
4. Holders who collected Talaarawan and Dogstyle art cover will get the same perks as the one who completed the album. 

View collection here!
objkt.com/profile/tz1Reocs9Z4sfnprYZUcwUyWfk3xAoUz9yU4/collections
cyber.xyz/exhibits/rTbT8H93qrJbdvuRVbxZ

NOTE:
Collecting this badge will guarantee you a full spoken word album airdrop in your wallet together with all the perks that you can experience.

PS:
This badge is transferable. Perks only.
